text:
@realDonaldTrump No one will ever forget your total failure with Covid19, the 100k deaths, tanked economy, on our way to another depression...
And, no one will forget that you tear gassed protesters to get to a photo shoot. That is authoritarian dictator-like un-American extremist action.
